Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19778602]Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC25923 (MIC=4.69 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=9.38 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML-35P (MIC=25.00 µg/ml);Yeast:Candida albicans ATCC2002 (MIC=5.63 µg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:19778602]Show weak hemolytic activity against rabbit red cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has weak hemolytic activity gainst rabbit red cells.

Literature.Title: Peptidomics and genomics analysis of novel antimicrobial peptides from the frog, Rana nigrovittata.
Literature.Author: Ma Y, Liu C, Liu X, Wu J, Yang H, Wang Y, Li J, Yu H, Lai R.
